Header: Cabinet focuses attention on Grade 5 scholarship examination
Content: Minister of Education Bandula Gunawardana stated that a wide discussion will be held regarding the Grade 5 scholarship examination at the next Cabinet meeting. Speaking at a meeting that was held in Maharagama the Minister stated that he had submitted a report to the recent cabinet meeting as well on the examination. The Minister stated that in future the examination will be held by obtaining views from Specialist Doctors and Psychiatrists.
